description: Numbers n such that 7*n - 2 is prime.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: lst={};Do[p=7*n-2;If[PrimeQ[p], AppendTo[lst, n]], {n, 10^2}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Sep 10 2008 *)Select[Range[400], PrimeQ[7# - 2] &] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 26 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [ n: n in [1..500] | IsPrime(7*n-2) ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2010
author: _Clark Kimberling_
